content: desert home hat is constructed first by knitting the ribbing then following a chart for the color work and the crown the hat fits like a standard beanie neither tight or slouchy i advise blocking it on a balloon that you blow up to measure 1 inch smaller than the head size you want desert home hat is knitted in fingering weight yarn that is 100% wool all yarns are from the knit pick palette line in these colors masala 86 yds marina 30 yds cornmeal 15 yds kumquat heather 30 yds bison 25 yds
